name: Invisible Blade X
description: Inflicts Ice Damage to nearby targets within a certain radius and temporarily decreases their Strength and Agility The Skill Effect increases when the target is affected by Wounding Critical.

name: Hide in Sight
description: Temporarily becomes invisible. Attacking or casting a skill cancels the spell. Can use in the middle of a battle.

name: Restoration
description: Restores some HP of the target.

name: Advent Legend
description: Temporarily gains immunity to Stun and Movement Speed reduction.

name: Two Weapon Mastery
description: Increases Accuracy and Damage while using Two-Handed weapon.

name: Safeguard
description: Temporarily increases Physical Resistance and Skill Block Rate of the caster and the designated target.

name: Fierce Blow
description: Inflicts a Damage on a nearby target and temporarily decreases its Intelligence and Wisdom. The Skill Effect increases when the target is affected by an Invisible Blade X.

name: Heroism Might
description: [Party] Temporarily increases Physical and Elemental Damage of the caster and the party members within range.

name: Boost Up
description: [Guild] Temporarily increases Strength, Wisdom and Stamina of the caster and the guild members within range.

name: Lightening Rush
description: Inflicts Lightning Damage to targets in a straight line and temporarily decreases their Movement Speed. Targets get stunned when they are affected by Fierce Blow.

name: Close Fin Air
description: Inflicts Air Damage to a nearby target and temporarily decreases its Skill Block Rate. The Skill Effect increases when the target is affected by Invisible Blade X.
